description.ko: 압도적인 어둠 속에서 번성하는 발광 생물들에 초점을 맞추어 심해의 평온함을 표현한 작품입니다.
description.en: A serene immersion into the deep ocean, focusing on the light-emitting organisms that thrive in the crushing darkness.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the AQUA-5 abyssal zone. Giant #48D1CC translucent jellyfish drift past #000080 hydrothermal vents emitting silver bubbles. Volumetric #006994 and #40E0D0 light rays pierce the dark water, illuminating marine snow and bioluminescent plankton. 8k resolution, fluid dynamics, the peaceful dance of transparent deep-sea life.
